name: !oG regiT oG
description:
This game is made for the TigerJ(am) 3 hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity with the theme sdrawkcaB si gnihtrevE.

In this game, you'll play as a tiger who'll have to reach the exit in under 10 seconds. Or at least, if that's not backwards.

Controls:

A or Left Arrow to go Right

D or Right Arrow to go Left

S or Space or Down Arrow to Jump

I was spiteful when progress of making the game. I'm not sorry :3

Credits:

Programmer - TheGamer

Animator - Darkaos

Music + SFX - TheGamer
